ygData.subject: Re: new shadow knight here
ygData.msgSnippet: U Sneeky Bastard! May the Darkness Protect You From the Evils that Lurk in the Sun Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal  ... From: Jeremy
ygData.messageBody:
U Sneeky Bastard!

May the Darkness Protect You From the Evils that Lurk in the Sun

Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
<lvl 13, SK, Rallos Zek>

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeremy <Jeremy@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 9:23 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] new shadow knight here


>From: "Jeremy" <Jeremy@...>
>
>A halberd will fit in a large sewing kit
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 2:42 PM
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] new shadow knight here
>
>
>> From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
>>
>> Hi!
>>
>> I hear there is a merchant in the Oasis of Marr that sells combine
>weapons,
>> but I have no idea how much. I have the (Lore) Shiny Brass Haldbred that
>> was dropped by the named orc in High Hold, dmg 16, not sure of speed. I
>do
>> not use it much unless running with my sisters because I cannot bag the
>> weapon and it makes me a walking shooting gallery. Sometimes powerfull
>> charecters sell Rune Totem Staves, I used to have one. Now I realise
that
>a
>> stick is not very Knight like, but no one complains when you are the only
>> tank beating back the ghoul in Befallen. I didn't actually start
>collecting
>> magic weapons as loot untill I was 17th level. That may be because we
>> didn't know where to go or just refused to brave the goody lands and risk
>> attack. At your level, all you can do is save your snake fangs and buy
>one.
>>
>> ~Xillith.
>>
>> HEY, is anyone aware of a container that will fit a haldbred? Shiny
Brass
>> is useless to me if I cannot bag it with all the scrapes I get into.
>>
>> Thanks.
>>
>>
>>
>>
>> >From: "Psion" <psionprime@...>
>> >Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>> >To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>> >Subject: [eq_shadowknights] new shadow knight here
>> >Date: Wed, 16 Jun 1999 19:35:54 -0400
>> >
>> >From: "Psion" <psionprime@...>
>> >
>> >Hello all. I occasionally take a break from my magi to play a sk on
>Xegony.
>> >I was wondering what would be a nice 2H magic weapon to quest for, for a
>> >first magic weapon. I'm not asking for any real spoilers, perhaps
someone
>> >could point me in the right direction ?
>> >
>> >My troll is level 8 at the moment and had saved enough plat to by a
>regular
>> >steel halberd at 36p. I've been told a few time that was monumentously
>> >stupid, but heh what can I say, troll's ain't rose that far out of the
>> >swamp ) Anyway, having only played a magi I'm not used to dealing with
>> >weapons and such, so what would be nice to have ? what are some price
>> >ranges
>> >to save for, etc ? Any help/thoughts on the subject would be cool, and
my
>> >thanks to you.
>> >
>> >Bumzuk of Grobb
>> >
>> >
